entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -20.8°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
